a.n: Herménégilde Chiasson, De Ruptures En Contraintes

p.d: A key figure on Acadia's cultural scene, Herménégilde Chiasson's work is prolific and multifaceted. Superbly creative, displaying a passion for images and words, he has worked to enrich and invigorate contemporary Acadia. An intimate portrait, itself designed like a work of art, produced based on the artist's first name. Directed by: Ginette Pellerin (Canada, 2016)
